text: Silvio Grappasonni (born 9 August 1962) is an Italian professional golfer. He represented Italy 6 times in the World Cup between 1987 and 1997. He is the son of Ugo Grappasonni. He is a commentator on Italian Sky Sport. ==Professional wins (3)== *1987 Italian PGA Championship *1991 Italian National Open *1992 Italian National Open ==Team appearances== Amateur * Eisenhower Trophy (representing Italy): 1984 Professional *World Cup (representing Italy): 1987, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1997 *Dunhill Cup (representing Italy): 1987, 1992, 1996 ==External links== * Category:Italian male golfers Category:European Tour golfers Category:Sportspeople from Como Category:1962 births Category:Living people
